Reviews.Title: Advertised as New - product received was not new!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I'll update the review once I have a satisfactory reply from the company.Bottom line: the product I received was not an unopened, new product as advertised.It was apparent that the box had been opened and re-closed with packing tape. Also, inside was not the typical Sony packaging - camera was in ripped plastic bag, camera did not have the Sony product tag on it, warranty documentation as well as other papers were missing, and the included accessories were not new packaging (not in sealed bags or plastic but re-tied with twisties).Have not tried the product yet - waiting for a response from Discounts Jungle.
